document.full_text: new york's public theater announced its second consecutive summer of casting a repertory company of actors in its two shakespeare in the park productions, "measure for measure" and "all's well that ends well."
document.title: repertory casting returns for shakespeare in the park
lines_and_colors: new york's public theater announced its second consecutive summer of casting a repertory company of actors in its two shakespeare in the park productions, "measure for measure" and "all's well that ends well."
